text: Edit Sági was a female Hungarian international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== She won a bronze medal at the 1952 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's doubles with Gizi Farkas and the following year won another bronze in the women's doubles with Zsuzsa Fantusz. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Hungarian female table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Edit Sági
